page.title: 01BOURNEMOUTH & CHRISTCHURCH
page.content: THE CONURBATION OF POOLE, BOURNEMOUTH AND CHRISTCHURCH IS, BY FAR, THE LARGEST BUILT-UP AREA IN DORSET AND THIS BLOCK IS SITUATED IN THE SOUTH-EAST CORNER OF BOTH THE CONURBATION AND THE COUNTY. THE BLOCK INCLUDES THE CENTRE OF CHRISTCHURCH AND THE BOURNEMOUTH DISTRICTS OF POKESDOWN AND SOUTHBOURNE. THESE WELL-ESTABLISHED RESIDENTIAL AREAS HAVE GOOD LOCAL SHOPPING CENTRES AND THERE ARE SEVERAL OTHER SMALLER SHOPPING AREAS SUCH AS TUCKTON. RUNNING WEST-EAST ACROSS THE BLOCK IS THE SOUTH COAST OF ENGLAND. THERE ARE CLIFFS AND SANDY BEACHES WHICH ATTRACT MANY VISITORS AND LOCAL PEOPLE IN THE SUMMER. THOUGH THERE ARE HOTELS, GUEST HOUSES AND SERVICE INDUSTRIES IN THIS BLOCK THERE ARE NOT AS MANY AS IN THE TOWN CENTRE.
